title: Disconnected from chat
body:
a few days ago when i try to login to the game after i enter my username and password i get this :
Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server 
Now i log in and i can play but i am disconnected from the chat and i have some lags idk why?  Help pls

replies.body: Failure to connect to the PVP.net server may be due to an unstable connection preventing communication with the login server.  I recommend going over our [Troubleshoot Connection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.
